author: @vferraz88
text: As R is a 'specialized' programming language mainly used in statitics, it has less use cases then python. So comparing number of job posts isnt such an objective measure of which one is better at anythiing. If u cluster the job position by seniority / area there may be more insights to this. I myself think Python is better for general porpuses and probably as a 1st language to learn. But R definitly has its own merits.

author: @zBMatt
text: Python is better for digging in deep on data using methods like machine learning.   Just as Google said, R is better for base data science and statistical analysis. It makes things like data dashboard visualizations super easy.
